# AI Scribbles  

> AI Scribbles is a free AI-generated stock image site, all created and curated manually by us before publishing.

Important notes:

- AI Scribbles is completely free to use, with no accounts required.
- All images are free to use under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike (CC BY-SA) license.
- We add new images daily to keep the content fresh.
- Our team reviews every image before publishing to maintain high quality.
- The site offers a wide variety of AI-generated content, including photos, illustrations, clipart, and moreâ€”not just photos. 
- Use our AI-powered search to quickly find the perfect image.

## Popular Images  

- [Daily](https://aiscribbles.com/popular/daily/): Most popular images of the day  
- [Weekly](https://aiscribbles.com/popular/weekly/): Most popular images of the week  
- [Monthly](https://aiscribbles.com/popular/monthly/): Most popular images of the month  
- [Yearly](https://aiscribbles.com/popular/yearly/): Most popular images of the year  

## Pages  

- [Home](https://aiscribbles.com/): Browse AI-generated images  
- [Categories](https://aiscribbles.com/categories/): Explore images by category  
- [Generate](https://aiscribbles.com/generate/): Create AI-generated images  
- [How It Works](https://aiscribbles.com/how-it-works/): Learn about AI Scribbles  
- [Image License](https://aiscribbles.com/license/): Licensing information for using images  
- [Terms of Service](https://aiscribbles.com/terms/): Details on usage rights and restrictions  
- [Privacy Policy](https://aiscribbles.com/privacy/): Information on data privacy
